title: Snowdown Shop not available anymore?
body: I got given some RP for chirstmas but when I logged in to spend the snowdown shop tab was not available, my understanding is it would be there till the 31st?

replies.body:
Hey guys,

I am looking into it now. Will update you as soon as I can.

So this comment annoys me, I've been trawling through threads to try and find the aforementioned update on the issue, and so far - NADA! 
Give us a freaking update already! Is it a bug? Is it being squashed? Don't make this that time you shut down ranked all over again. Give us SOMETHING so that we can have some peace of mind. It's like Santa just went AFK...
Chill man, although i'm also waiting for an update but the RIOT GUYS DESERVES CHRISTMAS HOLIDAY AS WELL. Just be patient.

My only grievance is that it's not right to have the promise of an update and never actually receive one (without being a bloody twitter user).
I won't stress over the length of time it takes to resolve the issue, after all I'm not the one losing  precious **AUD** on this _public holiday where millions of people nation-wide are waiting to spend money on Riot Games..._
Hey everyone, the issue should be resolved now. Apologies for the inconvenience.
I thought so too and mine is missing... I got RP as a gift or Christmas and wanted to spend it in the snowdown shop

Removing it early is one thing, but removing it on Christmas day is just stupid. Something not right.

Or maybe they figured we don't get snow lol.
